Given that evolution, Steve Ballmer continued, "now is the time to put new leadership in place for STB." Muglia will apparently continue to run the division until summer, while his soon-to-be-former CEO conducts an internal and external search for a new leader. Muglia is just the latest in a raft of executive departures from Microsoft. In October 2010, Steve Ballmer announced the resignation of Chief Software Architect Ray Ozzie , who had helped shape the company's cloud strategy.
